item.title: MDH • 前端情报
item.description:
MDH • 前端情报

  • 代号：MDH(make developer happier)
  • 发起人: chencheng (云谦)
  • 仓库创建人: lencx
  • 资源提供人: 贡献者列表
  • 贡献: 我要贡献

🤝 不在群中的成员，也可以通过 Discussions 自荐信息，或提PR，期待优秀的你加入

规则

  • 👋 分享前端信息为主，八卦闲聊为辅
  • 📝 每周至少发一条信息
  • 🥺 长期不发言者会被踢出群

分享内容要求

  • ✅ 一手信息为主，名称 + 描述 + 感受的格式
  • 🙅 不发重复信息
  • 🈲️ 广告（推广自己的项目也算）
  • 🈲️ 招聘

情报收集

# 信息收集初步构想
fe-cool/news
|- [精选] # awesome
|- [news] # year
|     |- [2021] # year
|     |   |- [04] # month
|     |   |    |- 20 # day
|     |   |    `- ..
|     |   `- ...
|     `- ...
` ...

# 希望可以把收集到的信息通过多次分类
# 把最实用的工具，指南，APP，资讯类整理出来
# 做成一个推荐集合(即精选，文章类暂时排除在外)
# 文章可以在原始信息中进行查看
[2021/04/20.md]  -->  [2021/04/toc.md]  -->  [Awesome]
[day - 原始信息]  -->  [month - 汇总筛选]  -->  [awesome - 推荐]
  • 按日期进行原始信息收集，并在信息前打标签
  • 资讯(news)
  • 工具(tools): chrome，docs，dev 等
  • 前端(fe): node, webpack, vite, vue, react等
  • VS Code(vsc)
  • WebAssembly(wasm)
  • 编程语言(lang): rust，go，python 等
  • 其他(other): 难以界定的统一分类到其他
  • 月底对本月信息汇总分类(对信息进行筛选)
  • 汇总状态
  • 汇总中... - 📅 起止日期
  • 汇总完成 - 📅 起止日期

项目初衷

此活动是由云谦在微信朋友圈发起的，因为后入群的人其实是看不到之前人的分享的，微信群外的人更不可能看到。既然是在做有意义的事情，就想把这些东西沉淀下来，可以去长时间翻阅。“卷”这个词相信也是最近一两年在技术圈看到最多的一个字。没有信息会让人变得焦虑，💥信息爆炸会让人变得更加焦虑。唯一可以让自己变得不焦虑的途径，就是静下心来，按照自己的节奏，持之以恒。此项目创建的初衷也并非是为了让大家变得焦虑，而是希望站在一个更广阔的角度，去对信息做一层筛选。因为目前所有的收集是群友自荐，自己对文章和技术的理解，都是原始信息记录，还望大家酌情参考。

CC0-1.0 License | Copyright © 2021 fe-cool

item.title: Weekly
item.description:
Weekly

  • jondot/awesome-weekly - 来自软件界的优质每周精选新闻通讯的精选列表
  • zudochkin/awesome-newsletters - 精选的精选新闻通讯清单
  • zenany/weekly - 汇总平时看到的好文章，前端技术 & 产品研发为主...
  • 印记中文 - React Status Weekly
  • awesome-lowcode - 国内低代码平台从业者交流
  • 飞猪前端团队
  • JavaScript 文章精选月刊
  • ECMAScript双月报告
  • 湾区日报 - 关注创业与技术，每天推送3到5篇优质英文文章
  • sorrycc/weekly - 前端周刊，每周一发布。

item.title: 精选
item.description:
精选

随着信息收集工作的进行，我(lencx)发现其中有很多的工具，应用，技术指南，编辑器之类的东西，就想把它们抽离出来，单独进行分类维护。故开辟了精选分类。

item.title: Guide
item.description:
Guide

  • Developer Roadmaps - Step by step guides and paths to learn different tools or technologies (包含前端，后端，运维，安卓，数据库，react等)
  • Web Development for Beginners - A Curriculum - 24 Lessons, 12 Weeks, Get Started as a Web Developer
  • React Interview Questions & Answers - List of top 500 ReactJS Interview Questions & Answers....Coding exercise questions are coming soon!!
  • Top JavaScript Trends to Watch in 2021
  • CSS 奇技淫巧 - 不仅是为了拓宽解决问题的思路，更涉及一些容易忽视或是十分有趣的 CSS 细节
  • Modern CSS Solutions for Old CSS Problems - A series examining modern CSS solutions to problems Stephanie Eckles (@5t3ph), a seasoned frontend developer, has been solving for 13+ years.
  • A practical guide to TypeScript decorators
  • The TypeScript Handbook
  • Rust 入门 - 微软学习文档

item.title: Application
item.description:
Application

Cross-platform

  • Typora - A new way to read & write Markdown
  • Notion - All-in-one workspace
  • SourceTree - Simplicity and power in a beautiful Git GUI.
  • f.lux - Software to warm up your computer display at night, to match your indoor lighting.

MacOS

  • awesome-mac -  Now we have become very big, Different from the original idea. Collect premium software in various categories.
  • CheatSheet - Know your short cuts
  • Xnip - Handy Screenshot App for Mac
  • Bob - Bob 是一款 Mac 端翻译软件，支持划词翻译、截图翻译以及手动输入翻译。
  • thor - Switch the right application ASAP.
  • Runcat - The cat takes up residence in your Mac's menu bar, and he just keeps running!
  • Kap - An open-source screen recorder built with web technology
  • ImageOptim - Removes bloated metadata. Saves disk space & bandwidth by compressing images without losing quality.
  • MarginNote - A brand new e-reader to better study and digest your books.
  • Things - The all-new Things. Your to-do list for Mac & iOS
  • iStat Menus - An advanced system monitor for your menubar.
  • iTerm2 - iTerm2 is a replacement for Terminal and the successor to iTerm.
  • Maccy - Clipboard manager for macOS which does one job - keep your copy history at hand. Period.
  • Hidden Bar - An ultra-light MacOS utility that helps hide menu bar icons
  • Rectangle - Move and resize windows on macOS with keyboard shortcuts and snap areas.
  • Dropover - Dropover is a utility that makes it easier to manage and move content between folders, applications, windows and workspaces using Drag and Drop.

Windows

2021.05

汇总中... - 📅 2021.05.01 ~ 2021.05.14

Tools

  • Rome - Rome is a linter, compiler, bundler, and more for JavaScript, TypeScript, JSON, HTML, Markdown, and CSS.
  • slidev - Presentation Slides for Developers (Public Beta 🎉)
  • swimlanes.io - Swimlanes.io is a simple free online tool for making sequence diagrams
  • Preset - A command line tool for kickstarting your application's development by applying presets on top of it.
  • cusdis - lightweight, privacy-friendly alternative to Disqus.
  • ChaosBlade - 阿里巴巴开源的一款简单易用、功能强大的混沌实验注入工具
  • uncode - Uncode 是一个面向云研发时代设计的下一代概念性 IDE。
  • JimuReport - 一款免费的数据可视化工具，报表和大屏设计，像搭建积木一样在线设计报表！功能涵盖，数据报表、打印设计、图表报表、大屏设计等！
  • 10 Best Online Flowchart Software Of 2021
  • Creately - Best collaborative flowchart software with live video conferencing
  • Miro - Best free flowchart software
  • Microsoft Visio - Best flowchart software for Windows
  • Gliffy - Best flowchart tool for Confluence & Jira (native Atlassian integrations)
  • Edraw Max - Best all-purpose diagramming software
  • ConceptDraw Diagram - Best flowchart software download (buy a one-time license)
  • Cacoo - Best online flowchart software for real-time team collaboration
  • Terrastruct - Best flowchart tool for software development
  • VisualParadigm Online - Best flowchart software for agile software development & data analytics
  • Draw.io - Best easy to use flowchart freeware
  • Replace Google CDN - 一个 Chrome 插件：将 Google CDN 替换为国内的。

Open Source

  • FingerprintJS - Browser fingerprinting library with the highest accuracy and stability.
  • inspx - Pixel perfect layout inspection.
  • mantine - React components and hooks library with native dark theme support and focus on usability, accessibility and developer experience
  • React-Toastify - React notification made easy 🚀 !
  • Fish Design - 面向B端设计的企业级UI组件库

Guide

  • Modern CSS Solutions for Old CSS Problems - A series examining modern CSS solutions to problems Stephanie Eckles (@5t3ph), a seasoned frontend developer, has been solving for 13+ years.
  • A practical guide to TypeScript decorators

Weekly

  • sorrycc/weekly - 前端周刊，每周一发布。

WebAssembly

  • Using asynchronous web APIs from WebAssembly

MacOS

  • awesome-mac -  Now we have become very big, Different from the original idea. Collect premium software in various categories.
